fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may Roam to a player's house, including the houses of dead players. You gain powerful defense and detection immunity tonight, and if there is a Trap (disarmed or armed) at their house, you pick it up and add it to your bag.
- At night, you may place a Trap at a player's house, losing one trap from your bag and giving the chosen target an armed trap. When a player visits a player with an armed trap, you indirectly deal a basic attack to them. Multiple players can trigger the same trap in one night (and you will attack all of them), but after being triggered it becomes disarmed and you must pick it back up.
- At night, you may attack a player. Cannot be used if you used it the night before.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- 8 random players start with disarmed Traps at their houses. Players cannot have more than 1 Trap at their house.
- You are not aware where disarmed Traps are.
- You start the game with 2 Traps.

- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__
